name: Diablo
description: Using the DIABLO GOG windows version's data with the DevilutionX engine. Linux native version!
notes:
Sound sliders are buggy, use pavucontrol to modify the game volume.

The Diablo+Hellfire gog installer doesn't work, you'll need the standalone Diablo one.

files.diablosetup: N/A:Select the EXE downloaded from GOG

content:
files:
- diablosetup: N/A:Select the EXE downloaded from GOG
- devil: https://github.com/diasurgical/devilutionX/releases/download/0.4.0/devilutionx-linux-i386.tar.xz
- innoextract: http://constexpr.org/innoextract/files/snapshots/innoextract-1.8-dev-2019-01-13/innoextract-1.8-dev-2019-01-13-linux.tar.xz
game:
  exe: $GAMEDIR/devilutionx
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    file: devil
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE/innoextract
    file: innoextract
- execute:
    args: --extract $diablosetup --output-dir $CACHE/diabdat/
    file: $CACHE/innoextract/innoextract
- move:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/diabdat.mpq
    src: $CACHE/diabdat/DIABDAT.MPQ
